wikipedia_page.main:
Alfred Nicol was an English professional footballer who played as a winger. He played nine matches in the Football League.
Nicol played for Clapton Orient's campaign in Southern League Division Two, making 17 appearances with 4 goals. He also appeared in 6 FA Cup ties, scoring 3 goals. He later played for Grays Athletic 1905, Tunbridge Wells Rangers 1906, Leyton 1907 and Gravesend United in 1907. Source: Neilson N Kaufman, club historian, Leyton Orient FC
